text: Blue morpho may refer to several species of distinctly blue butterfly under the genus Morpho, including: * Morpho cypris (Cypris blue morpho) * Morpho didius (Didius blue morpho) * Morpho helenor (Helenor blue morpho) * Morpho menelaus (Menelaus blue morpho) * Morpho peleides (Peleides blue morpho) * Morpho rhetenor (Rhetenor blue morpho) It may also refer to: * The Blue Morpho, a character in the animated adventure-comedy series The Venture Bros. Category:Animal common name disambiguation pages
title: Blue morpho
